home.tagline:
Building scalable, production-ready AI and software systems across Computer Vision, NLP, and Agentic AI.
6+ years • Senior ML Engineer & SWE — production deployments, agentic orchestration, and CI/CD at scale.

about.title: Passion
about.content:
I am a Senior Machine Learning Engineer and Software Engineer with over 6 years delivering enterprise-grade AI and software solutions. I focus on moving models into production — writing reliable model code, robust APIs, and repeatable deployment pipelines.

My work spans Computer Vision, NLP, and agentic systems that automate analytics and workflows. I prefer shipping maintainable code and building observability into ML systems from day one.

I enjoy open-source tooling and pragmatic engineering: making complex systems simple to operate and measure.

experience.title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer & SWE — Fractal AI
experience.description: Led engineering for Fractal AI (India's First AI Unicorn Company), a multi-agent orchestration platform (LangGraph / LangChain). Owned tool onboarding and metadata lifecycle to productize agent behaviors for largest US telecom's business use.
badges: 3,000+ CI/CD in just a few weeks

experience.title: Technical Lead ML Engineer — HCL
experience.description: Implemented human-in-the-loop feedback and automated deployment flows; added Label Studio + FastAPI annotation pipelines, Trivy scanning, MLflow tracking and Seldon serving.

experience.title: ML Engineer — Chugani
experience.description: Built a real-time liveliness detection service (MTCNN + FaceNet), converted prototypes to modular MLOps pipelines, and established monitoring + retraining flows on AWS.

experience.title: ML & ETL Engineer — Yang
experience.description: Delivered AI + ETL systems for smart-factory operations; shipped a 24/7 IPQC audit system (≈200 hours/week saved) and dashboards across 20+ vendor sites.

experience.title: Internships - Junior ML Engineer and Data Analyst — TCS & Infosys
experience.description: Completed internships at Tata Consultancy Services and Infosys, gaining hands-on experience in machine learning, data analysis, and software development practices.

contact.name: Uday Lunawat
